definition: in regular succession without gaps, a periodical that appears at scheduled times
details:
adjective
- in regular succession without gaps
= example: in regular succession without gaps
= synonyms: consecutive
- of or relating to the sequential performance of multiple operations
= example: of or relating to the sequential performance of multiple operations
= synonyms: nonparallel, in series
- pertaining to or occurring in or producing a series
= example: pertaining to or occurring in or producing a series
- pertaining to or composed in serial technique
= example: pertaining to or composed in serial technique
noun
- a periodical that appears at scheduled times
= synonyms: series, serial publication
- a serialized set of programs
= synonyms: series
